xeno_early_start.gameplay.not_enough_fue: This primitive fire have no fuel to burn, throw some burnable before relighting
text.config.xeno_early_start.option.earl: Fuel Time Required For Max Light Level (%)
Maximum Burn Time Primitive Fire Can Hold
Multiple To Fuel Time Fuel Gives
Amount Of Time Primitive Fire Gain When Fire Starter Is Used To Relight
text.config.xeno_early_start.option.mobC: Probability Of Mob Spawning With Copper Tool
Probability Of Mob Spawning With Equipment
A flat, additive increase to the probability a mob is spawned with equipment. (There is a small chance they won't be spawned with any even at 100%)
Probability Of Copper Armour Replacing Vanilla Armour On Spawned Mob
Probability only applies to mob already spawning with equipment.
Make Polar Bear Always Aggressive At Player
Follow Range Of A Polar Bear
Only apply on newly spawned mob
Make Some Mob Attack Player That're On Low Health Or Hunger
Make Wolf Aggressive At Player At Night
Bat Gives Player Nausea When Touched
text.config.xeno_early_start.option.oreC: Use vanilla's mining int level, as a workaround for modded pickaxe that didn't register their material to TierSortingRegistry.
Mined ore drop raw ore and replace block with stone/deepslate/netherrack.
text.config.xeno_early_start.option.bloc: Damage Dealt When Entity Step On Stonecutter
Damage Dealt When Entity Step On Cooker
Damage Dealt When Entity Step On Brick Furnace
Damage Dealt When Entity Step On Furnace
Damage Dealt When Entity Step On Blast Furnace
Blast Furnace Set Nearby Block On Fire
Damage Multiplier When Player Fall On Amethyst
Fix Vanilla Issue Where Walking On Block With Thin Hitbox Doesn't Play The Correct Sound
text.config.xeno_early_start.option.hung: Exhaustion When Player Wake Up From Bed
Exhaustion When Player Row A Boat
text.config.xeno_early_start.option.clie: DO NOT ENABLE THIS unless you already know how this mod works
text.config.xeno_early_start.title: Progression Change
text.emi.xeno_early_start.fire_starter_n: Fire Starter can be used on any fuel item
death.damage.coral_0: %s found out coral isn't fun to step on
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.guide: Read the advancement page for more info on how to get started!
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.guide_more: Right click this item or use keybind:
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.fire_start: Can be created with fire starter
Can be used to create a primitive fire, or to relight an extinguished fire for §p%s§f minute(s)
Requires §p%s§r minute(s) worth of dropped burnables (at least §p%s§r sticks) to create a new primitive fire
Has a 25 chance of success, 50 when in dry biome, but always fails in rain
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.raw_brick: Dries into a brick when placed down and exposed to sun unobstructed
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.raw_brick_: Drying progress reset when exposed to rain, this can be avoided by placing glass over the raw brick, at the cost of drying speed
It is also advisable to protect the raw brick from being trample on by zombie
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.brick_thro: Throwable (please exercise caution and restraint near glass)
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.brick_obta: Can also be obtained by drying raw brick
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.primitive_: Fuel will slowly deplete, throw burnables to refill
Can hold up to §p%s§f minute(s) worth of burn time (equivalent to §p%s§f sticks)
Flint and Steel or Fire Starter is required to relight
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.plant_fibe: Obtained by breaking grass/leaves with shards (e.g. flint/knapped stone)
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.pebble: Obtained by breaking stone/its cobbled variant with pickaxe below copper tier
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.pebble_to_: Use on a cobbled block with pebble on both hand to obtain knapped stone
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.shards: Breaking grass/leaves with this has §p%s§f chance of dropping plant fiber
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.knapped_st: Obtained by clicking on a cobbled block with pebble in both hand
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.food_warni: You probably don't want to eat this
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.raw_food_w: You probably don't want to eat this raw
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.flint: Obtained by breaking gravel (10 chance of success) or clicking gravel on grindstone (20 chance of failure)
xeno_early_start.item.tooltip.starting_g: To get started, find gravel and obtain flint (and check Advancement for guide!)
advancements.xeno_early_start.root.title: Xeno Early Start
advancements.xeno_early_start.root.descr: This will guide you through any changes this mod make!
advancements.xeno_early_start.tips.title: Modded Recipe Viewer
advancements.xeno_early_start.tips.descr: Downloading EMI can make viewing modded recipe added by this mod easier!(This mod does not provide JEI/REI recipe for custom interactions)
advancements.xeno_early_start.configs.de: A considerable amount of "stuff" can be tweaked in the config page! (for example, raise drop rate of plant fiber cause you're impatient like me)
advancements.xeno_early_start.flint.desc: Flint have a chance of dropping when a block of gravel is broken
advancements.xeno_early_start.grass.desc: Break grass or leaves with a flint in hand
advancements.xeno_early_start.plant_fibe: Breaking grass with flint have a §p%s§a chance of dropping plant fiber
advancements.xeno_early_start.flint_pick: Craft a flint pickaxes with flints, stick and plant fiber
advancements.xeno_early_start.flint_hatc: Craft a flint hatchet with flint, stick and plant fiber
advancements.xeno_early_start.dagger.tit: Is This A Dagger I See Before Me
advancements.xeno_early_start.dagger.des:
Craft a flint or bone dagger with stick, bone/flint and plant fibers
 (p.s. can be duel-wielded if Better Combat is installed!)
advancements.xeno_early_start.log.title: Deforestation
advancements.xeno_early_start.log.descri: Obtain logs by breaking a tree with a flint hatchet
advancements.xeno_early_start.fire_start: Craft a fire starter with log, stick and plant fibers
advancements.xeno_early_start.primitive_: Create a primitive fire by dropping §p%s§a minutes worth of burnable item (at least §p%s§a sticks) on the floor, and right clicking them with a fire starter. (note: there are chances of failure)
Primitive fire will slowly go dim and burn out, but you can throw more burnable at it to extend the duration
Primitive fire can be used to turn logs into charcoal and cook food just like a campfire
advancements.xeno_early_start.charcoal.d: Obtain charcoal by putting logs onto a primitive fire
advancements.xeno_early_start.sugar_cane: Obtain sugar cane by exploring the wilderness (usually near large body of water)
advancements.xeno_early_start.sugar.desc: Craft sugar using sugar cane (this will come in handy later)
advancements.xeno_early_start.charcoal_g: Reach the end of the Gravel achievement tree to obtain charcoal and unlock the rest of this tree
advancements.xeno_early_start.treated_wo: Craft treated wood using sugar, planks and charcoal
advancements.xeno_early_start.wooden_hoe: That's still quite a lot of effort, just for a wooden hoe
advancements.xeno_early_start.wooden_pic: You could've just crafted a stone pickaxe directly!
advancements.xeno_early_start.clay.title: Clay
advancements.xeno_early_start.clay.descr: Break clay blocks that can be found underwater in shallow water or lush cave
Can be crafted with clay balls and charcoal
advancements.xeno_early_start.raw_brick_: And remember to protect your raw brick from zombie and rain!
advancements.xeno_early_start.brick.desc:
Obtained by placing Raw Brick directly below sunlight with no block obstructing
Drying progress reset when exposed to rain  (you can use glass to avoid this, but drying occur at a slower rate)
advancements.xeno_early_start.brick_furn: Craft a brick furnace with bricks (block)
advancements.xeno_early_start.treated_wo: Reach the end of the Sugar Cane achievement tree to obtain treated wood to continue
advancements.xeno_early_start.crafting_t: Can be crafted with bricks and treated wood
advancements.xeno_early_start.flint_pick: To continue, follow the Gravel achievement tree in The Beginning tab to unlock flint pickaxe
advancements.xeno_early_start.stone.desc: Mine a block of stone with a flint pickaxe and see what happens
advancements.xeno_early_start.pebble.des: Pebble have a chance to be dropped when you mine a stone or cobble block with basic (pre-copper) pickaxe
advancements.xeno_early_start.knapped_st: Obtain knapped stone by clicking on a stone block with pebbles of the same kind on BOTH hand
advancements.xeno_early_start.stone_pick: Craft a stone pickaxe using knapped rocks and sticks
Unlock by crafting the stone pickaxe by following the Mine achievement tree in Stone Age tab (which itself require flint pickaxe from the Gravel tree)
advancements.xeno_early_start.copper_ore: Mine a block of copper ore with your brand new stone pickaxe
advancements.xeno_early_start.raw_nugget: Until you reach a diamond-tiered pickaxe (or use the now iron-tiered gold pickaxe), you'll get raw nuggets instead of raw ore
advancements.xeno_early_start.raw_copper: Craft raw copper using raw copper nuggets
advancements.xeno_early_start.copper.des: Obtain copper by smelting raw copper, or obtain copper nugget by smelting raw copper nuggets
advancements.xeno_early_start.brick_furn: Craft a brick furnace by following the Clay achievement tree in The Beginning tab
advancements.xeno_early_start.order_gett: Look for the The Beginning tab to find out how to start
advancements.xeno_early_start.order_ston: Once you've finished Getting Started tree, look for the Stone Age tab to find out how to continue
advancements.xeno_early_start.crafting_t: Unlocked when you obtain your first crafting table, check the Clay advancement tree in The Beginning tab
advancements.xeno_early_start.copper_pic: Craft a copper pickaxe using copper ingots and sticks
advancements.xeno_early_start.fist_break: You can't punch tree! Look at the advancement page to find how to how progress!
advancements.xeno_early_start.coal_ore.d: Do not stand near 2 block radius of coal ore, as you may be at risk of inhale any dust released by coal ore. To avoid unwanted explosion, don't placing torch/fire near coal ore
advancements.xeno_early_start.coal_dust_: Inhaling coal dust may cause fatigue, blindness and could prove to be fatal (consider investing in cleaner energy)
Breaking coal block within close vicinity will lead to a chain explosion, well, you probably knew that already by now
advancements.xeno_early_start.iron_age.c: Unlocked when you obtain your first copper pickaxe, to figure out how, reach the end of the Stone Age tree
advancements.xeno_early_start.iron_age.i: Mine a iron ore block with your brand new copper pickaxe
advancements.xeno_early_start.iron_age.g: Mine a gold ore block with your copper pickaxe
advancements.xeno_early_start.iron_age.r: Craft raw iron using raw iron nuggets
Craft raw gold using raw gold nuggets
advancements.xeno_early_start.iron_age.i: Obtain iron ingot or nugget by smelting raw iron in brick furnace
advancements.xeno_early_start.iron_age.g: Obtain gold ingot or nugget by smelting raw gold in brick furnace
advancements.xeno_early_start.iron_age.i: Iron pickaxe can mine ore in its nugget form
advancements.xeno_early_start.iron_age.g: Golden pickaxe is now iron-level (can mine diamond) and it drops raw ore instead of raw nuggets
